name: Lobby
description: A room on the smaller side. it has big open archways leading to the two biggest rooms and a smaller glass door leading to the caf√©.

name: Cafe
description: Quite tiny place with lots of plants and string lights. there is only a few people here and behind the counter stands a freckled brunette in an apron, smiling at you.

name: Gift shop
description: Very cluttered space filled with fish-themed plushies, magnets, shirts, bags and many others. The local cashier seems...distracted by his phone, maybe best if you don't talk to him much.

name: Restaurant
description: A very spacious clean room wit blue walls and lots of tables and chairs. The space is crowded with hungry visitors and all the staff here seems really busy
